clues.clue: East, Central & West this island are 3 of some 30 provinces of Indonesia... why do I suddenly want some coffee?

final_jeopardy.clue: In 1838 he took a new last name, of a family in Walter Scott's "The Lady of the Lake"; for distinction he added a 2nd "S" to the end
